nodes.text: L3-E7 Colossus was a battle droid model used by the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY four Colossus droids were used to defend the approach to the Bastion in the Coronet City on Corellia, but were destroyed during the assault by the Galactic Republic forces.

L3-E7 Colossus appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as "Imperial Colossus Droid" during the Trooper class mission on Corellia, the designation L3-E7 appears only in game files. The droids appear in one of three possible approach routes and, depending on the player's choices, can be destroyed by the Fifty-third Armored Platoon, the Eighty-first Infantry or by Havoc Squad.
